item.title: 日本顶级商业游说团体邀请激进基金艾略特参与公司治理对话
item.description: 日本最大的商业游说团体经团联已邀请激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司于3月5日举行非公开会议，讨论公司治理问题。路透社获得的经团联致会员企业通知显示了这一安排。【原文：Japan's biggest business lobby, Keidanren, has invited activist investor Elliott Investment Management ‌to a private meeting on March 5 to discuss issues of corporate governance, it told member firms in a notice seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 快讯：贵金属暴跌引发连锁反应，市场全面下挫
item.description: 周一亚洲交易时段，贵金属价格暴跌引发市场全面下挫，导致过去一年表现最佳的众多股票遭遇大范围抛售。【原文：A collapse in precious metals spilled over into broad markets in Asian trading on Monday, prompting broad selling of many of the top-performing stocks of the past year.】

item.title: 从日本到巴西，选民可能在关键选举年撼动市场
item.description: 从日本到巴西，今年即将举行的选举可能为市场增添更多不确定性，而这些市场早已因美国政策动荡和地缘政治紧张局势加剧而备受冲击。【原文：From Japan to Brazil, elections could add yet more uncertainty this year to markets already whipped by U.S. policy gyrations and heightened geopolitical tension.】

item.title: 航空业领袖应对产业与地缘政治逆风
item.description: 航空业领袖们在周一新加坡航展开幕前夕，共同探讨了制约行业发展的障碍及地缘政治紧张局势的影响，同时重申了降低排放的承诺。【原文：Aviation leaders tackled barriers to growth and the impact of geopolitical tensions on the eve of the Singapore Airshow on Monday, while reaffirming pledges to reduce emissions.】

item.title: 全球经济：亚洲制造业活动因强劲全球需求而扩张
item.description: 亚洲制造业活动在1月份扩张，因强劲的全球需求提振了出口订单，周一公布的私营部门调查显示，这为政策制定者提供了一定程度的保证，即美国提高关税带来的冲击目前已告一段落。【原文：Asia's factory activity ​expanded in January as solid global demand lifted export orders, private-sector surveys ‌showed on Monday, offering policymakers some assurance the hit from higher U.S. tariffs has run its course for now.】

item.title: 阿根廷以8.08亿美元从美国购买提款权以偿还国际货币基金组织债务，媒体报道称
item.description: 阿根廷从美国财政部购买了8.08亿美元的特别提款权（SDR），用于支付给国际货币基金组织（IMF）的利息款项，当地报纸《民族报》周日报道称。【原文：Argentina bought $808 million in Special ​Drawing Rights (SDRs)from the U.S. ‌Treasury to meet an interest payment to the International Monetary Fund (IMF), local newspaper ‌La Nacion reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 对中国猪肉不满，中国希望回归黑猪养殖
item.description: 高向华今年是个快乐的妈妈，因为她知道家里的青少年孩子们会争先恐后地吃完她为春节大餐炖煮的五花肉。【原文：Gao Xianghua is a happy mom this year because she knows her teenage kids will eagerly finish the pork belly she is braising for the Lunar New Year feast.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，迪士尼董事会即将任命主题公园业务主管达马罗为下一任首席执行官
item.description: 据彭博社周日援引知情人士报道，华特迪士尼董事会即将提拔主题公园部门主席乔希·达马罗担任首席执行官一职，并将于下周投票表决任命新任首席执行官人选。【原文：The board of Walt Disney is close to promoting theme-park division chairman Josh D'Amaro to the role of chief executive officer and will vote on naming a new leader next week, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股市震荡，金属价格剧烈波动，企业财报季临近
item.description: 亚洲股市周一普遍跟随华尔街期货走低，白银市场的混乱交易令本周开局充满紧张情绪。本周将密集公布企业财报、央行会议及重要经济数据。【原文：Asian share markets mostly followed Wall Street futures lower on Monday as chaotic trading in silver made for a nervous start to a week ​that is packed with corporate earnings, central bank meetings and major economic data.】

item.title: 日本制造业活动增速创近三年半新高，PMI数据显示
item.description: 日本制造业活动在1月份以近三年半来最快的速度增长，一项私营部门调查显示，强劲的客户需求推动了产出和新订单的增加。【原文：Japan's manufacturing activity grew at the fastest pace in about three and a half years in January, a private-sector survey showed, as strong customer demand drove an increase in output and new orders.】

item.title: 现代汽车放弃回购俄罗斯汽车工厂的选项
item.description: 韩国汽车制造商现代汽车周一表示，在乌克兰战争持续之际，该公司未行使对俄罗斯前制造工厂的回购选择权。【原文：South Korean automaker Hyundai Motor did not exercise a buyback option for its former manufacturing plant in Russia, the company said on Monday, amid the continuing war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，投资者权衡沃什领导下的美联储；日元再度成为焦点
item.description: 美元周一维持涨势，因投资者正评估凯文·沃什领导下的美联储可能呈现的政策面貌——他倾向于缩减资产负债表规模。【原文：The dollar clung to its gains on Monday as investors weighed what a Federal Reserve under Kevin Warsh ​might look like, with his preference for a smaller balance sheet.】

item.title: 甲骨文公司表示，计划今年通过债务和股权融资筹集高达500亿美元资金。
item.description: 甲骨文公司周日表示，预计将在2026年筹集450亿至500亿美元资金，用于扩建其云基础设施的运算能力。【原文：Oracle expects to raise $45 billion to $50 billion in 2026 to build additional capacity ​for its cloud infrastructure, the software company said ‌on Sunday.】

item.title: 受伊朗谈判及欧佩克+暂停增产影响，油价下跌近3%
item.description: 周一油价下跌近3%，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周末表示伊朗正与华盛顿进行"认真对话"。【原文：Oil prices fell by nearly 3% on Monday as U.S. President Donald Trump said over the weekend Iran was "seriously talking" with Washington.】

item.title: 美国食品药品监督管理局启动计划以促进国内药品生产
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周日开始接受参与其预检试点项目的申请，该项目旨在通过加快国内药品生产厂的建设和审查来提升国内药品供应量。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Sunday began accepting requests to participate in its PreCheck pilot program, designed to boost domestic drug supply by speeding up construction and review of drug manufacturing plants in the country.】

item.title: X平台对数千美国用户出现故障，Downdetector数据显示
item.description: 据Downdetector.com网站显示，周日美国数千名用户遭遇了埃隆·马斯克旗下社交媒体平台X的故障。【原文：Elon Musk's social media platform X was down for thousands of users in the United States on Sunday, according to Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 法国科技公司凯捷将出售与洲际交易所相关的美国子公司
item.description: 法国IT公司凯捷周日宣布将出售其美国子公司凯捷政府解决方案公司，此前该公司因后者与美国移民执法机构ICE签订的合同而面临解释压力。【原文：French IT company Capgemini will sell its U.S. subsidiary Capgemini Government Solutions, it said on Sunday, after coming under pressure to explain a contract the latter signed with U.S immigration enforcement agency ICE.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+原则上同意维持原定计划，3月暂停增产
item.description: 据路透社在周日会议前获得的三位欧佩克+消息人士及一份声明草案显示，八个欧佩克+国家已原则上同意维持原定计划，暂停3月份的增产安排。【原文：Eight OPEC+ countries have agreed in principle to maintain a planned pause in their oil output hikes for March, according to three OPEC+ sources and a draft statement seen by Reuters ahead of their Sunday meeting.】

item.title: 中国比亚多汽车销量连续第五个月下滑
item.description: 比亚迪1月份汽车销量同比下滑30.1%，连续第五个月出现下滑。这家中国电动汽车制造商正面临外部不确定性和国内激烈竞争的双重压力。【原文：BYD's vehicle sales fell by 30.1% in January from a year earlier, the fifth straight month of decline, as the Chinese electric vehicle maker navigates external uncertainties and tough competition at home.】

item.title: 印度允许外资企业为制造商提供设备资金，此举为苹果赢得胜利
item.description: 印度政府周日为苹果公司赢得重大胜利，允许外国公司在五年内自由向其在特定地区设立的合同制造商提供设备，且无需担心任何税务风险。【原文：India's government on Sunday handed a major win to Apple by allowing foreign companies to freely provide machines to their contract manufacturers set up in certain areas for five years, without fearing any tax risk.】

item.title: 日本经济新闻报道，贝恩资本敲定以12.9亿美元收购FineToday控股的计划
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周日报道，贝恩资本已敲定收购日本个人护理公司FineToday Holdings的计划，该公司旗下拥有椿（Tsubaki）洗发水品牌。这笔交易预计价值约2000亿日元（合12.9亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital has finalised plans to acquire FineToday Holdings, the Japanese personal-care company behind the Tsubaki shampoo brand, in a deal expected to be worth around 200 billion yen ($1.29 billion), Nikkei reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，随着油价飙升，欧佩克+计划维持3月暂停增产的安排
item.description: 三位欧佩克+代表向路透社透露，该组织周日稍晚召开会议时，很可能维持原定计划，暂停3月份增产石油。此前因市场担忧美国可能对欧佩克成员国伊朗发动军事打击，原油价格已触及六个月高点。【原文：OPEC+ is likely to keep its planned pause on oil output increases for March when it meets later on Sunday, three OPEC+ delegates told Reuters, even after crude prices hit six-month highs on concern the U.S. could launch a military strike on OPEC member Iran.】

item.title: 法国科技公司凯捷表示将出售美国子公司
item.description: 法国科技公司凯捷周日宣布，将出售其美国子公司凯捷政府解决方案公司。【原文：French tech company Capgemini said on Sunday it was selling its U.S. subsidiary Capgemini Government Solutions.】

item.title: 马斯克表示，阻止俄罗斯使用星链的措施似乎奏效了
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克周日表示，SpaceX为阻止俄罗斯"未经授权"使用星链卫星网络所采取的措施似乎已见成效。【原文：Elon Musk said on Sunday that steps SpaceX had taken to stop the 'unauthorized' use of Starlink by Russia seemed to have worked.】

item.title: 印尼允许埃隆·马斯克旗下Grok重启服务，解除对性化图像的禁令
item.description: 印度尼西亚政府声明称，在X公司承诺加强遵守该国法律后，印尼已允许埃隆·马斯克旗下的Grok聊天机器人恢复服务，并解除了对该应用中色情化图像的禁令。【原文：Indonesia has allowed Elon Musk's Grok chatbot to resume services, lifting a ban over sexualised images on the app, after X Corp committed to improving compliance with the country's laws, according to a government statement.】

item.title: 中国1月新建住宅价格上涨，政府释放支持信号，民间调查显示
item.description: 周日公布的一项民间调查显示，在政府重申稳定房地产市场的承诺后，1月份中国100个城市新建商品住宅均价上涨，二手房市场跌幅收窄。【原文：Average prices of new homes across 100 Chinese cities rose in January, while declines in the secondary market narrowed, a private survey showed on Sunday, following renewed government pledges to stabilise the sector.】

item.title: 美国炼油厂罢工期限临近，工会与管理层举行马拉松式谈判
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（USW）与马拉松石油公司的谈判代表周六继续会谈，此时距离美国多家炼油厂和化工厂可能罢工的最后期限仅剩数小时，该工会表示。【原文：Negotiators for the United Steelworkers union (USW) and Marathon Petroleum continued to meet on Saturday, just hours ahead of a deadline for possible strikes at multiple U.S. refineries and chemical plants, the union said.】

item.title: "人民之父"黄仁勋赞誉英伟达供应商，在台湾访问期间推动供应商发展
item.description: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋在造访其出生地台湾期间，既赞扬又委婉敦促台湾主要供应商增加产量以满足强劲的人工智能需求。此行中，他每到一处都受到热情粉丝的簇拥。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang praised and lightly cajoled his major Taiwanese suppliers to produce more to help power strong demand for AI, capping a visit to the island of his birth, where he has been mobbed by adoring fans at every step.】

item.title: 法国汽车行业协会称，1月份法国新车注册量下降6.55%
item.description: 法国汽车协会PFA周日公布的数据显示，今年1月法国新车注册量同比下降6.55%，至107,157辆。【原文：New car registrations in France declined 6.55% in January from a year earlier to 107,157 vehicles, data from French car body PFA showed on Sunday.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，福特汽车与中国小米就电动汽车合作事宜展开磋商。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周六报道，知情人士透露，福特汽车已与电动汽车制造商小米就组建合资企业、在美国生产电动汽车事宜展开磋商。【原文：Ford has held talks with electric-vehicle maker Xiaomi about forming a joint venture to manufacture EVs in the U.S., the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
